descriptionHtml:
[b][color=#fe4201][size=05][/color][/b][center][b][color=#fe4201]Lylvieve Sisters Quests/Followers[/color][/size][/b][/center]

[b][color=#f8a505]10/27/16: Update coming soon![/color][/b]


[color=#fe4201]Description[/color]
=================================
This mod contains adult situations - If you are offended by that kind of thing, please leave now.

Modifies one existing NPC as a follower and adds one aditional follower, both with marriage option.
[b][color=#f8a505]Fully voiced dialogue.[/color][/b]

Julienne Lylvieve: a combat scout - good sneak, light armor, and bow skills. She is available as a follower after doing her quest.
Nanette Lylvieve: a combat nightblade - good sneak, 1H, and mage. She is available for follower and marriage after a few "fade to black" sex scenes.

[color=#fe4201]Requirements[/color]
=================================
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/]ApachiiSkyHair[/url]

[color=#fe4201]Issues/Conflicts[/color]
=================================
Command codes (Just in case something doesn't fire):
"SetStage AALS01 30" updates after you get the lute
"SetStage AALS01 40" updates after you give the lute to Julienne
"SetStage AALS03 50" updates after the courier is supposed to give you the letter.


[color=#fe4201]Location[/color]
=================================
Dragon Bridge (S.W. of Solitude) - Starts at Juilienne Lylvieve. She's either at Four Shields Tavern or Lylvieve house.

[color=#fe4201]Install[/color]
=================================
With your mod manager or --
Extract the archive with [url=http://7-zip.org]7-zip[/url]. Copy the LylvieveSisters.esp and LylvieveSisters.bsa and paste in your Skyrim/Data folder. In Skyrim Launcher go to Data Files and activate LylvieveSisters.

[color=#fe4201]Uninstall[/color]
=================================
Uncheck LylvieveSisters in Skyrim Launcher Data Files.
Delete: LylvieveSisters.esp and LylvieveSisters.bsa

[color=#fe4201]Credits[/color]
=================================
ApachiiSkyHair for making NPCs and PCs look so much better.
Katy Theodossiou and digifish music for Julienne's singing voice.

[color=#fe4201]Tools Used[/color]
=================================
Audacity 1.3
Unfuzer - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9797
Creation Kit
author: DizzasterJuice
